approval-date.description: The date and time when the reimbursement was approved.

reimbursement-id.description: The unique identifier for the reimbursement record.

case-id.description: The case ID associated with the reimbursement.

amazon-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon order related to the reimbursement.

reason.description: The reason provided for the reimbursement.

sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product.

fnsku.description: The Fulfillment Network SKU of the product.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product.

product-name.description: The name of the product for which the reimbursement was issued.

condition.description: The condition of the product for which the reimbursement was issued.

currency-unit.description: The currency unit used for the reimbursement amount.

amount-per-unit.description: The amount reimbursed per unit of the product.

quantity-reimbursed-cash.description: The quantity of the product reimbursed in cash.

amount-total.description: The total amount reimbursed for the product.

quantity-reimbursed-inventory.description: The quantity of the product added back to inventory as reimbursement.

quantity-reimbursed-total.description: The total quantity of the product reimbursed.

original-reimbursement-id.description: The original reimbursement ID associated with the record.

dataEndTime.description: The end time of the data represented in the record.
